places_to_visit.name: Lake Wakatipu
places_to_visit.description: Lake Wakatipu is a stunning, long, and narrow lake surrounded by mountains. It’s ideal for scenic cruises and offers breathtaking views.

places_to_visit.name: Remarkables Ski Area
places_to_visit.description: The Remarkables Ski Area offers fantastic skiing and snowboarding opportunities with stunning alpine scenery. It’s a must-visit for winter sports enthusiasts.

places_to_visit.name: Skyline Queenstown
places_to_visit.description: Skyline Queenstown offers a scenic gondola ride to the top of Bob's Peak, where visitors can enjoy panoramic views and a range of activities including luging.

places_to_visit.name: Arrowtown
places_to_visit.description: Arrowtown is a charming historic town known for its preserved gold rush era buildings and vibrant autumn colors. It offers a glimpse into New Zealand’s past.

places_to_visit.name: Fergburger
places_to_visit.description: Fergburger is a renowned burger joint in Queenstown, famous for its gourmet burgers and casual atmosphere. It's a popular spot among locals and tourists alike.
